overview:
Juliet Flint joined Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers in 2001 as a Partner. Juliet works with the portfolio companies advising them on areas of Human Capital, including executive leadership, recruiting, compensation, corporate governance and team building.

Most recently, Juliet was a Managing Director of Ramsey Beirne Associates, a leading provider of executive searches to high-growth, leading-edge companies. Prior to that, Juliet was a Partner at Heidrick & Struggles, a global executive search firm, where she led CEO and VP searches. Juliet began her career with Procter & Gamble in the United Kingdom. She gained her bachelor’s degree from the Newcastle Business School at Northumbria University in the United Kingdom.
